metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a githyanki soldier near the captain's office. He's preparing to go search for the weapon, and has no time for the player.

0.speaker: Raider Chy'raagh
0.text: Chk. Another outsider. Make yourself at home. The ch'r'ai certainly has.
0.context: NodeContext: Pissed off, failing to hide it

1.speaker: Raider Chy'raagh
1.text: I work alone. If you wish to join a patrol, speak to the kith'rak.
